author: Jonathan
comment: Looks great with defaults.  Hope you like them because none of the options "available" work on the free version.  Ambient mode doesn't change, no matter what you set it at.  Makes me not want to try the pay version because I'm afraid of the same issues.

author: Alberto Lanaro
comment: I have a problem with Android Wear 2, I can't see the watchface in the smart watch. Any suggestion?

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content: Does you installed watchface via phone or watches? If phone, the most common reason is loosing connection, so you can try reinstall via watches. If watches, maybe it is listed in full list of available watches.

author: Mark Lilley
comment: Love the simplicity but they are dishonest in that what they tell you you can do with edits, you cannot do. So I will uninstall and give poor ratings until it is fixed.

author: Jake Harvey
comment: Nice looking watch face but no matter how I set the ambient mode in the app, it doesn't change on the watch. It only displays the default bient mode regardless of how the app is set.

author: Miguel Rico
comment: I can't customize this at all. The changes done in phone never reflect on watch. Using pixel 2xl and Huawei 2classic

author: arnab basu
comment: Nice looking watch face. Love the uncluttered look.can we get the option of displaying the phone battery instead of watch battery?

author: Andrew Elgie
comment: Can't customize at all, if it could have ambient mode turned off so the red second timer is always moving I'd be willing to pay money.

author: Gabriel S.
comment: How the hell make it work with my smartwatch , no metter what face i choose it doesn't work.  Fabulouswatchfaces - u r the dev . Please explain this

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content: What do you mean saying "doesn't work"? Can you see it in the list of available watches? Can you select it? Does it appear after selecting?

author: Gurbaksh Chana
comment: Cannot change any settings, does not update - fossil q explorist

author: Cole Ketzel
comment: It is a good looking watch face app but it doesn't let you customize anything

author: Derek O'Harrow
comment: The concept is great but I can't change it from the default display to digital only.

author: Darren Huang
comment: Looks ok, customisation does not work.

author: Rev. Evol
comment: Super integrated with my Moto 360 and Moto Z Force! Love it!!!

author: Insurmountable MC
comment: would be better if it was customizable
Nice simple and stylish

author: Deep Chand Saragadam
comment: Good quality

author: j. cababe
comment: Nice & Simple

author: Paul Ng
comment: Good

author: Liam Richards
comment: If you're planning to customise to digital watch face or change the colours at all, don't bother. Any changes you make don't actually update on the watch and the watch face constantly crashes meaning the face changes to a default theme. Never had watch faces crash before, waste of Internet data downloading 0/10

author: Brandon Reznik
comment: I turned off the ambient mode because I like the original hands better, is there a way to turn off the complications? I don't need them and think it clutters up the watch face

author: Michael De Santa [aka TheGamerKing]
comment: Dude, let me tell you, this is the best, snazziest app I have ever seen before! Very intuitive, responsive, and very fancy according to my review, and even runs smoothly on my ASUS ZenWatch! 🤑👍👍

author: Eoghan Murphy
comment: Doesn't transfer to watch face at all.  This app needs to be updated and at least calibrated to allow the changes to happen so that it works well.

author: Tom Mohammed
comment: Nice. Would far prefer that the battery showed my phone instead of watch battery. I don't really need to know my watch battery as it always lasts the day.

author: Kevin Webber
comment: You have the best quality looking watchfaces I have came across so far.

author: Ronald Rivera
comment: This face no is compatible with wear  2.0

author: Alvester Garnett
comment: Just a clean simple look. I like that it is analog but with on option to show digital when in ambient mode.

author: Benjamin Chew
comment: Downloaded but can't find in Android Wear nor watch. Pls help.

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content:
The most common reasons are losting connection or wrong user data. So, the best solution is:
1. Full uninstall (remove from phone and make sure, that app removed from watches)
2. Make sure that devices are paired
3. Install app to the phone
4. Wait, while watch face will appear on watches (this will take some time 2-5 min)

author: James Wilson
comment: Really like it, but wish it showed my phone battery instead of my watch battery.

author: 박종흠
comment: Texts, hands are too dark

author: Maxim Tsarenkov
comment: It's ok. I like it!

reply.author: FabulousWatchFaces
reply.content: Send the crash report and describe problem more detail. Thank you for comment.
